===============

## Government Tender Announcement
### Polycom Maintenance and Support
#### Solicitation Number: BPM018063/21681

Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking a vendor to provide Polycom maintenance and support services. This tender is soliciting proposals from qualified contractors for the provision of these services.

#### Tender Details

* **Title:** Polycom Maintenance and Support or Equivalent
* **Reference Number:** SSC-23-00021681:T
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** BPM018063/21681
* **Publication Date:** February 21, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 14, 2023, at 14:00:00
* **Trade Agreements:** This tender is open to bidders under the following trade agreements: Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, and other agreements.

#### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category:** SRV and SRVTGD
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Shared Services Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada
* **End-User Entity Name:** Shared Services Canada
* **End-User Entity Address:** 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Person:** James Graves
* **Contact Email:** [james.graves2@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:james.graves2@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone:** 613-668-9563
* **Contact Fax:** (613) 960-6007

#### Tender Documents

The tender documents, including the solicitation package, can be downloaded from the SSC e-buy website: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/14913CE9-2A9E-47B3-B200-72EC32061681](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/14913CE9-2A9E-47B3-B200-72EC32061681) and subsequent links.
